name: Forgston Postal
description:
Forgston Postal is a retrieval clue game formed by Steel Peak Games as part of the 2022 Wholesome Games Jam.

This game is the brain-child of our take on the theme ‘Community’. Combining mail, mystery and a healthy enthusiasm for frogs, a postal delivery adventure was created. Here you will experience the life of Giuseppe, as our young hopper gains a passion for mail delivery in the midst of a storm. 

Collect letters, solve clues and interact with the world of Forgston. Who knows what secrets you will unfold? 

Most of the assets are our own, except the font from dafont.com: Simple Font - which we do not take credit for.

Forgston Postal was made in 48-hours, so ignore any bugs and have fun! 

Controls

  • WASD / Gamepad Left Stick - Movement
  • 'E' / Gamepad South Button - Pick Up Letters, Progress Conversations
  • 'Escape' or 'I' / Gamepad North Button  - Toggle Inventory

Open your inventory to deliver letters when you are next to the recipient.

To quit use 'Alt-F4' on Windows or 'Cmd-Q' on OSX.
